Aujean will set off for one of the 4 bars. 
 Keep an eye on his movements and reach 
 the bars before he does. 
  
 If you can reach the bar before Aujean, you 
 can pretend to work there and turn him away.
Flick Down on k : Change to Jupiter Style
That should be all of 'em!

Escape Illumina before it falls apart by 
 using the Gravity Slide. 
  
 Pass through the mysterious gates to 
 create a safe path through this highly 
 unstable and dangerous area.
SP Gems

Perform the Micro Black Hole special attack to create 
 a black hole around Kat that will destroy any enemies 
 caught inside. 
  
 The black hole won't work against some tougher enemies, 
 so be aware of that when using it.
Alright, I'm game. Let's do this.

Take a picture of a treasure box and its surroundings 
 to help other players find the treasure. 
 You'll earn Dusty Tokens if other players find treasure 
 based on your hints.
Obtained "Customer Appreciation" talisman! \n Equip talismans in the Talisman Menu.
Obtained "Desk" furnishing! \n Now available to decorate Kat's House.

While Gravity Sliding, you'll slide across the 
 ground and walls. 
  
 Press i to turn left or right and j to control 
 the camera. You can also press b to jump while 
 sliding. Release g to end the slide.
Challenge failed
Obtained "Fan" furniture! \n Now available to decorate Kat's House.

To avoid harm to the town and its citizens, 
 don't drop the package from high places. 
  
 If you run out of Gravity Gauge energy, 
 you'll automatically drop the package, 
 so keep an eye on your energy levels.
Approach the Nevi and take their picture. \n (l: Equip Camera)

While holding the stinky package in a Stasis Field, 
 Kat will begin to have trouble enduring the stench 
 wafting from it, and her endurance gauge will rise. 
 When the gauge maxes out, Kat will pass out. 
 Press a to drop the package and move away to 
 catch your breath and reset the endurance gauge 
 before continuing the job.
I think I'm getting too far away. I should go back.

Press h to change gravity styles. 
  
 While in Jupiter Style, your movement speed 
 slows, but your attack power rises.
Finishers
h + down on j : Change to Jupiter Style

Without being seen by the soldiers, 
 grab supply crates and throw them off the Bismalia. 
  
 To maintain your cover, your Stasis Field range 
 will be limited, so get close to the crate before 
 trying to grab it in a Stasis Field.

Press c while shifting to perform Raven's version 
 of the Gravity Kick, the Blood Talon. 
  
 Repeatedly press c to spin the attack up and 
 cause more damage.

The Lunar Style Charged Stasis Field, Gravity Vortex, 
 is useful for taking out groups of thugs. 
  
 Hold a (about 1 second) while near objects you 
 can grab in Stasis Fields and use some of your 
 SP Gauge's energy to launch the attack.

Press a to drag nearby objects into a Stasis Field. \n You can then throw the collected objects at enemies.

Find the place in the picture shown down in the lower-right, 
 and take a new picture of it.

Tilt the camera slowly up, down, left, or right 
 to pinpoint the direction the sensor reacts to.

Gravity Kicks and Stasis Field throws are the most 
 effective way to knock over targets. 
  
 Don't rely too heavily on standard ground-based attacks 
 or you will end up wasting a lot of time.
Jupiter Style: Gravity Slide
Defeat the Enemies within \n the Time Limit

Throwing objects with Stasis Fields is the best 
 way to attack faster enemies. 
 When trying to hit fast enemies with the Gravity Kick, 
 wait for when they stop to perform the kick. 
  
 It's also dangerous to wait too long in one place, 
 so press i + h to dodge enemy attacks mid-air.
Fighting the Light
Lunar Style: Mid-Air Evasion
Stone Tablet: \n Defeat enemies with sliding. Being heavy will help.

Press i in a direction + b to

For most of the talismans you obtain through mining, 
 certain effects are only associated with certain shapes. 
 By morphing the shape, you can combine effects from 
 otherwise incompatible talismans.
Adjust the course of your fall with i.

Kat usually finds talismans while mining gravity ore, 
 but can also obtain some as rewards for completing 
 events or from treasure hunts. 
  
 When mining, talismans are earned after Kat brings back 
 talisman stones for appraisal.

If your Grigo hacks another Grigo, that Grigo will 
 start to follow you. 
  
 If you take the hacked Grigo near a police officer, 
 it will issue a false alarm to draw the officer away. 
 Use this technique to remain hidden.
Gravity Limitations in the World Pillar

v Reset Camera

Press a to grab nearby objects in a Stasis Field. 
  
 While grabbing objects, aim at an enemy until the 
 homing circle locks on, then press a again to 
 throw the objects at the enemy.

In Lunar Style, you can flick k to avoid enemy 
 attacks mid-air. 
  
 With this convenient technique, you can also stretch your 
 jump's range to land on just-out-of-reach locations.

Press d while in Lunar Style to initiate a 
 Gravity Typhoon special attack that launches 
 nearby objects forward. 
  
 This attack is more effective the more objects 
 there are in the nearby area to grab and fling.

Talk to Raven on the mining boat to ask her 
 to take over for Kat at the mining site. 
  
 Raven can't equip talismans, but she is more 
 likely to find them out in the field. 
 Talk to Kat again to switch back.

Nevi! I need to take 'em down quick.

Tenebria can power up by absorbing 
 energy from areas where there is darkness. 
  
 Defeat the dark Nevi to return the 
 area to light and prevent her from 
 powering up.

While in Jupiter Style, running into, sliding into, 
 or attacking objects can destroy things other styles cannot. 
  
 Use this to your advantage if you discover some debris 
 that can't be cleared in other gravity styles.

Use all of Raven's abilities to defeat the Collectors.

You can adjust the camera angle while 
 shifting gravity by tilting the controller. 
 Motion sensor sensitivity can be adjusted by 
 pressing r and selecting "System." 
 If you set the sensitivity to 0, you can 
 turn off the effect of the motion sensor.

While in Lunar Style, shift gravity and get an enemy 
 into the homing circle, then press c to initiate a 
 Wormhole Kick. 
  
 After performing the Wormhole Kick, you can press c 
 again to follow up with another mid-air kick.
Evasion
It can be difficult to land Gravity Kicks on fast enemies, \n so time the kick for when they are stopped.

Pretend to be a Scarab Person to reach your destination. 
 If one of the Scarab People starts to suspect you, 
 imitate whatever it's doing to keep your cover. 
  
 If they realize you're not one of them, who knows 
 what they'll do.

Jump across the airboats to reach your destination, 
 and finish with a roll. 
  
 If you fall or fail the roll, you'll need to reshoot 
 the scene.

Press d to consume all of the energy in your SP Gauge 
 to perform a special Micro Black Hole attack. 
  
 Sliding with g is faster, and harder to control than 
 in other styles, but you can punch right through obstacles.

If the special attack indicator is blinking, press d to 
 consume energy from your SP Gauge and initiate 
 a Spiraling Claw. 
  
 The Spiraling Claw is a powerful attack that 
 automatically locks on to enemies.

Enemy markers appear over enemies that are not 
 visible on screen. If an arrow the color of an enemy 
 marker appears on the screen, it means there's an 
 enemy in that direction. 
  
 Aim the camera with j to find the enemy.

Take pictures of the boyfriend when he's 
 meeting with any women in secret. 
  
 Make sure the woman's face is clearly visible 
 and that both her and the boyfriend are in the shot. 
 (l: Equip Camera)

The Gravity Typhoon automatically attacks enemies near 
 the middle of the screen, so use j to line up enemies 
 you want to attack. 
  
 The Gravity Typhoon is at its most effective when 
 there are a lot of objects in the area.

While fighting in Lunar Style and floating (f), 
 aim the targeting reticle at an enemy to get 
 a homing circle and press c to initiate 
 a wormhole kick.

If you aim the targeting reticle in the center of the screen 
 at an enemy, a blue homing circle will appear on the enemy's 
 weak point. If you press a when that circle is visible, 
 you'll throw objects at that weak point.

Hold a (about 1 second) even when not holding 
 anything in a Stasis Field to consume some 
 SP Gauge energy and perform a Piercing Throw. 
 Nearby objects will be pulled into a vortex that 
 you can throw to do a large amount of damage. 
 The vortex will pierce through weaker enemies 
 and continue to seek out other enemies.

Hold b (about 1 second) then release it to perform

You will be sent back to Hekseville before 
 climbing the World Pillar, but you will 
 retain all of your powers earned after. 
  
 You can climb the World Pillar again, 
 or complete any unfished side or challenge 
 missions or continue mining for ore.

The SP Gauge's energy gets refilled when 
 you deal or take damage. 
  
 As long as your SP Gauge is filled past the line,

When you've managed to weaken a powerful enemy, 
 you have a chance to finish them off by pressing 
 the touch pad button. 
  
 The touch pad button display is k
c while in Lunar Style: Attack \n Flick k while in Lunar Style: Evade in Flicked Direction

Battle Nurse II - Scene I
Get Closer to the Treasure \n to Take a Hint Picture
Mission Markers
Morphing

Walk near people to grab attention. When you 
 have enough, it's your chance to eat and 
 advertise the ice cream. 
  
 However, if you take too long, the ice cream will melt. 
 Also, if you get too close to people, they'll begin 
 to realize you're not Kali. If they recognize you, you fail.

Press i + b to make a long horizontal Rocket Jump. 
  
 The key to pulling this maneuver off is briefly letting 
 go of i then pushing it again at the same time as b. 
 You can adjust your direction and how far you jump 
 using i.
Raven: \n Want to switch things up for a bit?

If your Gravity Gauge runs out of energy 
 while you're carrying someone in a Stasis Field, 
 they will fall and you will fail the mission. 
  
 Be careful to keep an eye on how much energy you have.
When Kat gestures to passerby, they'll react to her. \n Try a variety of gestures to bring in customers.
Story Missions
This time you need to summon the \n element of Darkness. Defeat the light Nevi \n and claim their territory for the darkness.

While in Jupiter Style, sliding is faster, and you can 
 do damage when you run into things. 
  
 This extra speed comes with a drawback: 
 it's more difficult to turn, and you can't climb stairs.

When your Gravity Gauge runs out of energy, 
 you can no longer control gravity. 
  
 Energy will recover naturally over time as long as 
 you aren't using any gravity powers.

Jump from the starting point and flick k before 
 you land to roll. Continue to do this until you safely 
 reach the ground. 
  
 Take damage or fail to roll, and you'll need to 
 reshoot the scene.
To head down to a mining site, talk to Misai, \n who is usually found near the boat with the crane.
You can also replay previous missions from Kat's house, \n as well as warp to manholes on the map.

In Lunar Style, gravity is weaker, 
 affecting movement and attacks. 
  
 You can kick against walls to jump higher, or walk across 
 brittle or delicate surfaces such as water bubbles.
Phew, hope no one got hurt.

Lumino can power up by absorbing 
 energy from areas where there is light. 
  
 Defeat the light Nevi to return the 
 area to darkness and prevent him 
 from powering up.

While in Jupiter Style, Stasis Fields will cause 
 objects to compress together into a Debris Ball. 
  
 Hold a (about 1 second) to pull nearby objects 
 into a giant, highly compressed Debris Ball.

Gesture to one of the town's beauties,

 to quickly travel from place to place.

Attracting Customers

Every time you land a hit, the tension gauge will rise. 
 As time passes or if you take damage, the tension 
 gauge will fall again. 
  
 If the gauge maxes out, you'll enter a brief period 
 of bonus time when you'll be in Jupiter Style.

Complete the challenges presented by the stone tablets 
 to continue further into rift planes. 
  
 Challenges are not always just about defeating Nevi. 
 If you need to double-check what the challenge is, 
 approach the tablet to reread it.

If you're seen or heard by soldiers, their alert level rises. 
 Run away and hide until it drops back down. 
  
 If their alert level reaches its maximum, you'll be spotted. 
 Quickly dispatch the guard before they can sound the alarm. 
  
 Knock out too many guards and the patrols will increase.

You can only control up to one hacked Grigo at a time, 
 though you can always decide to take the hacked Grigo 
 to some place out of sight and destroy it. 
  
 Destroying hacked Grigos is an effective way to whittle 
 down their numbers.
Gravity Gauge & Energy Gems

Collect vitality gems to restore your health. 
  
 There are other gems with different effects, 
 so collect them whenever you find them.

While in Lunar Style, hold a (about 1 second) 
 to generate a Vortex Field on any objects 
 you grab in the Stasis Field. 
  
 Hit an enemy with a Vortex Field to freeze them for 
 a short time, giving you an opportunity to open up on 
 them with attacks.

The Giant Collector is trying to destroy the Ark. 
 Keep up your attacks to keep it focused on Raven instead. 
  
 While the Giant Collector is following Raven, 
 guide him to Kat and Dusty in front of the 
 downtown train station.
Playing with the Dog Disc

Press a to use Stasis Fields and haul cargo to the boat. 
  
 A Stasis Field will lift all of the objects in a 
 limited area. For some special objects, pressing a 
 again will gently lower the object back down to 
 the ground rather than throw it.

Continue to attack Fi until he drops a bell.

 you'll automatically forfeit a bell.

When two soldiers are close together and you attack one,

 you can prevent them from getting a report off to HQ.

The Bismalia is guarded by soldiers who will go on alert 
 if they notice signs of your presence. When the alert 
 level is maxed out, they will call your activity in to HQ. 
  
 Reach your destination without being spotted.

You won't be able to shift gravity during this mission, 
 as it might damage the cargo. 
  
 Use Lunar Style Spring Jumps and Rocket Jumps

Thugs wearing grav-suits can take a lot of hits. 
  
 If the thugs reach the store, even if it still has 
 some reputation left, you will fail the mission. 
 Make the grav-suit wearing thugs your first priority.

Throwing objects with Stasis Fields is the best 
 way to attack faster enemies. 
 When trying to hit fast enemies with the Gravity Kick, 
 wait for when they stop to perform the kick. 
  
 It's also dangerous to wait too long in one place, 
 so flick k to dodge enemy attacks mid-air.

 before he reaches a bar, he'll recognize you.

Destroy all of the bridges indicated by markers 
 to separate the two islands.

 throw them at bridges to blow them up. But be careful, 
 hold an explosive too long, and it'll blow up in your face.

Panther Mode
Discover the mysterious manholes scattered throughout \n the city to unlock them as warp points you can use \n to quickly travel from place to place.

The Nevi are attuned to the light and darkness. 
 If you defeat them, their remains will flow to 
 where you need to go. 
  
 Defeat Nevi and follow their trails to track 
 down the Keepers of Light and Darkness.
Stone Tablet: \n Reach your destination within the time limit.

 in the pile of boxes within the time limit. 
  
 Run out of time, and the bomb will explode, 
 requiring another take.

 pull some into a Stasis Field.

Obtained "Aqua Treasure" talisman! \n Equip talismans in the Talisman Menu.

You can recycle 5 unwanted talismans to obtain 
 a new talisman. The higher the value of the recycled 
 talismans, the higher the likelihood of obtaining a 
 new talisman with a rare effect. 
 If you have leftover talismans from merging and 
 morphing, try your luck at recycling them.
Raven's Stasis Field is similar to Kat's, but if you \n hold a (about 1 second) to charge the field, \n she will create an Energy Ball she can hurl.
Beauty Pictures
Jupiter Style: Debris Ball

While floating or shifting, press c when an enemy is 
 in the homing circle to perform a Gravity Kick on them. 
  
 If you don't have the enemy locked on, the kick will miss. 
 Also, faster enemies can evade your attacks even when 
 locked on.

h or h + i : Change Gravity Styles
Wh-Who are you!?

To defeat a Nevi, destroy all of the red, glowing 
 "cores" on its body. 
  
 Attacking any other part of a Nevi won't deal any damage.
a Generate Stasis Field \n Hold a : Vortex Field (Drains SP Gauge)
Defeat the Enemies without \n Using Gravity Powers
Misai: \n Right, lowering you down!

In Lunar Style, you can press i + h to 
 avoid enemy attacks mid-air. 
  
 With this convenient technique, you can also stretch your 
 jump's range to land on just-out-of-reach locations.
